medical_history.chief_complaint: Skin fragility and peeling since birth.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began at birth with generalized erythema and erosions. Minor trauma resulted in skin peeling. Condition worsened during the summer, with the development of small blisters after sun exposure.
medical_history.past_medical_history: The patient had diarrhea as a neonate. Previous skin biopsy showed spongiosis and loss of keratinocyte adhesion. Treatment with oral zinc supplements resulted in some clinical improvement but not long-term clearance.
medical_history.family_history: Parents are first cousins with a similarly affected child who died at 5 months of age.
